subject: Catching junit.framework.AssertionFailedError
msgSnippet: Hello all: Am using MaxQ for generating test scripts in Jython. It uses the JUnit API.In the script generated by MaxQ, there are assertions, whcih looks like
messageBody:
Hello all:

Am using MaxQ for generating test scripts in Jython.
It uses the JUnit API.In the script generated by MaxQ, there are
assertions, whcih looks like

self.assertEquals(200, self.getResponse().getStatusCode())

Now, i would like to know whether there is any way to catch
junit.framework.AssertionFailedError, as in try-catch-finally.

thanks,
siraj
